name: VRJAM (BLUE)
public_notice: VRJAM's token economy will now include 2 separate tokens VRJAM (RED) & VRJAM (BLUE). For more information, please refer to this Medium post.

description.en:
VRJAM is a multiplayer social gaming and live events platform built to empower global brands and premium 
content creators to create immersive ‘real-time’ consumer experiences inside virtual worlds.

VRJAM was founded in 2017 with a vision to combine blockchain and immersive technology to transform 
human experience in digital space. Today, VRJAM is an immersive, live experience platform built on the Matic 
blockchain designed to magnify the connectedness of human beings in virtual space. It will help transform the 
metaverse for the better and create new ways to enhance and value human experience

RJAM Coin is VRJAM’s in-game ERC20 token, built on the Matic (Polygon) network. It is used 
to facilitate a wide and varied array of use cases for trade and value exchange inside VRJAM’s virtual world from ticket 
sales and advertising. 
The day after the launch of the VRJAM platform, the VRJAM Coin token will launch via 3 of the world’s leading 
exchanges, Gate, MexC and Kucoin (please note exchanges are subject to change).

VRJAM was founded in 2017 with a vision to combine blockchain and immersive technology to transform 
human experience in digital space. Today, VRJAM is an immersive, live experience platform built on the Matic 
blockchain designed to magnify the connectedness of human beings in virtual space. It will help transform the 
metaverse for the better and create new ways to enhance and value human experience

RJAM Coin is VRJAM’s in-game ERC20 token, built on the Matic (Polygon) network. It is used 
to facilitate a wide and varied array of use cases for trade and value exchange inside VRJAM’s virtual world from ticket 
sales and advertising. 
The day after the launch of the VRJAM platform, the VRJAM Coin token will launch via 3 of the world’s leading 
exchanges, Gate, MexC and Kucoin (please note exchanges are subject to change).

VRJAM is a multiplayer social gaming and live events platform built to empower global brands and premium 
content creators to create immersive ‘real-time’ consumer experiences inside virtual worlds.

VRJAM was founded in 2017 with a vision to combine blockchain and immersive technology to transform

to facilitate a wide and varied array of use cases for trade and value exchange inside VRJAM’s virtual world from ticket 
sales and advertising.

exchanges, Gate, MexC and Kucoin (please note exchanges are subject to change).
